mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.fid AS "fid", a.store_id AS "storeId", a.nub AS "nub", a.sj AS "sj", a.goodsid AS "goodsid", a.sjje AS "sjje", a.dates AS "dates", a.state AS "state", cr.ddbh AS "ddbh", cg.name AS "name", cs.dz AS "dz", cs.name AS "csName"
LEFT JOIN c_rkckddinfo cr ON a.fid=cr.id LEFT JOIN c_goods cg ON a.goodsid=cg.id LEFT JOIN c_store cs ON a.store_id=cs.id
mapper.select:

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_xsddls( id, fid, store_id, nub, sj, goodsid, sjje, dates, state ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{fid}, #{storeId}, #{nub}, #{sj}, #{goodsid}, #{sjje}, #{dates}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE c_xsddls SET fid = #{fid}, store_id = #{storeId}, nub = #{nub}, sj = #{sj}, goodsid=#{goodsid}, sjje=#{sjje}, dates=#{dates}, state=#{state} WHERE id = #{id}
